fullName: Book Management API Validations: Fetch book by valid ID
name: Fetch book by valid ID

steps.name: Given  a user signs up and logs in successfully
User Signup: expected 200, actual 200. User created successfully. Response: {"message":"User created successfully"}

User Login: expected 200, actual 200. Login successful. Response: {"access_token":"eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJzdWIiOiJib29rZmxvd191c2VyXzE3NDkwMTYwMjY0ODVAbWFpbC5jb20iLCJleHAiOjE3NDkwMTc4Mjd9.r1b7CSHJJae0_Z1n8CJ24MvL7WrUHSdLOut9OW2STZg","token_type":"bearer"}
Given  a book payload with name "FetchTestBook", author "QA", year 2023, and summary "To be fetched" is prepared
Prepared book payload: Book{id=27868, name='FetchTestBook', author='QA', published_year=2023, book_summary='To be fetched', cover_image_url='null'}
When  user sends a request to create a new book
Book creation request response: Status: 200, Body: {"book_summary":"To be fetched","id":27868,"author":"QA","published_year":2023,"name":"FetchTestBook"}
And  user fetches book by valid ID
Fetching book by valid ID: 27868, Response Body: {"book_summary":"To be fetched","id":27868,"author":"QA","published_year":2023,"name":"FetchTestBook"}
Then  verify single book fetch response code is 200 and book name is "FetchTestBook"
Fetch Book by ID: expected 200, actual 200, expectedName: FetchTestBook, actualName: FetchTestBook
